bibl.title: Reinscribing the Jews: The Story of Aristides' Apology 2.2-4 and 14.1b-15.2.
bibl.note: Offers a fresh look at the ancient witnesses of this important text [including 2 papyri], critiques Pouderon's attempt to reconstruct a primitive text of Apology 14, builds on Pouderon's valuable contributions through comparative analysis of material in the ""Egypt Narrative"", and broadens the scope of investigation to include Apology 2.2-4 and 14.1b-15.2.
bibl.seg: William C. Rutherford, Reinscribing the Jews: The Story of Aristides' Apology 2.2-4 and 14.1b-15.2.

Offers a fresh look at the ancient witnesses of this important text [including 2 papyri], critiques Pouderon's attempt to reconstruct a primitive text of Apology 14, builds on Pouderon's valuable contributions through comparative analysis of material in the ""Egypt Narrative"", and broadens the scope of investigation to include Apology 2.2-4 and 14.1b-15.2.
